snippet.title: Steve-O Reacts To Bam Margera Arrested After New Lawsuit... (REAL FOOTAGE)!?
snippet.description:
Steve-O Reacts To Bam Margera Arrested After New Lawsuit... (REAL FOOTAGE)!?
There is a lot going on right now with the movie Jackass Forever, and not exactly in the good way. Because there are two different people trying to file suit against the film for various reasons. One of them is PETA believe it or not. Who are furious at the fact that the movie goes and uses animals in ways that are harmful to them and are even forced to do damage to the guys in the film. But even more pressing is the matter of Bam Margera, who is suing them for a "Wellness Agreement" that he was forced to sign and that got him fired from the movie. But was that legal? We'll break it down for you. Be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel!

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbiT0LUIbQj6CQScvWHJeKQ?sub_confirmation=1

And there you have it, everyone! A look at the case of Bam Margera and whether the "wellness agreement" that he went and signed was valid at all, and how he should proceed with things going forward. Are you shocked that he had to go and sign that in the first place? Do you personally feel that it was legal? How do you think this whole lawsuit will end? Let us know in the comments below, be sure to subscribe and we'll see you next time on the channel!

You are not required to comment to win the giveaway distributed in the video. It is ONLY a recommendation. You must have a twitter under the same username of youtube in order to qualify to get in contact with you. For more information on giveaways refer to youtube’s contest policies:  
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/1620498?hl=e
